participant_1.background:
I'd brag about my sense of humor.
I enjoy dressing up as my favorite characters from comic books and anime.
I have a pet dog who is always happy to see me, no matter how bad my day was.
I make enough money to be able to enjoy my hobbies, like music.
I'm passionate about exploring the unknown and creating my own style.

participant_2.background:
I like my friends and my pets the most.
I'm a 35 year old male police officer who collects interesting things I find on my couch.
I had to say goodbye to my mother when she passed away.
I listen to music that makes me forget about my troubles and live in the moment.
i eat large meals.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
I'm doing good, thanks. I'm interested in learning more about you.
Sure, what would you like to know?
I like to spend time with my friends and family, and I also like to collect interesting things that I find on my couch.
That's interesting! What kinds of things do you collect?
I collect a lot of different things, but my favorite things to collect are coins and rocks.
Coins and rocks? That's cool! I've never met someone who collects those things before.
Yeah, I know it's not a very common hobby, but I find it really enjoyable.
What do you like about collecting coins and rocks?
I like the history behind them, and I also like the challenge of finding new and interesting ones.
I can understand that. I enjoy collecting things too, but I usually collect things that I can use, like clothes or furniture.
That's a good way to collect things too! I like to have a variety of things in my collection, so I have some things that I can use and some things that are just for fun.
That's a good idea. I might start collecting some things that are just for fun too.
I think you'd enjoy it! It's a lot of fun to have a collection of things that you love
